mapper.sql: SELECT `id` id, `mchn` mchn, `third_party_payment_id` thirdPartyPaymentId, `trade_date` tradeDate, `trade_type` tradeType, `item_no` itemNo, `contract_no` contractNo, `out_fuiou_username` outFuiouUsername, `out_platform_username` outPlatformUsername, `amt` amt, `charge` charge, `this_repayment_principal` thisRepaymentPrincipal, `this_repayment_interest` thisRepaymentInterest, `come_fuiou_username` comeFuiouUsername, `come_platform_username` comePlatformUsername, `loan_username` loanUsername, `loan_cert_type` loanCertType, `loan_cert_no` loanCertNo, `lend_username` lendUsername, `lend_fuiou_username` lendFuiouUsername, `lend_name` lendName, `lend_cert_type` lendCertType, `lend_cert_no` lendCertNo, `busi_type` busiType, `status` status From `t_gq_fss_depos_fuiou_busi_trade` t
